creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Children are playing in the dorm. This dorm is inhabited by displaced people from eastern Ukraine, which is frequently under attack. 10 years ago I started my “Daily Life” series, documenting how people share a common space. Today I continue to take photographs of people who was forced to leave their home because of russian invasion to Ukraine and now share the space with people who host them, as well as other displaced.
